title: Privacy Engineer III, Google Ads AI/ML
location: Mountain View, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA
description: In this role, you will work with cross-functional teams within Google on activities related to compliance and privacy.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience designing solutions that maintain or enhance the privacy posture of the organization.
preferred_qualifications: Experience balancing risks in ambiguous situations with multiple stakeholders. Knowledge of common regulatory frameworks (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).
responsibilities: Guide engineering teams during product development to ensure that their data collection and usage practices are transparent, protect user privacy, and mitigate risk.
